document.full_text: japanese retail sales fell 8.5 percent in march from a year earlier, logging their biggest year-on-year decline since march 1998, after a devastating earthquake and nuclear crisis battered consumer confidence, government data showed on wednesday.
document.title: japan retail sales log biggest fall since 1998
lines_and_colors: japanese retail sales fell 8.5 percent in march from a year earlier, logging their biggest year-on-year decline since march 1998, after a devastating earthquake and nuclear crisis battered consumer confidence, government data showed on wednesday.
